title: BRIEF-Andeavor Reports Q4 Results
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Andeavor:
* ANDEAVOR REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.61 * ‍Q4 2017 REFINING SEGMENT OPERATING LOSS WAS NEGATIVELY IMPACTED BY APPROXIMATELY $185 MILLION​
* QTRLY ‍REVENUES $10,652 MILLION VERSUS $6,652​ MILLION * ‍Q4 2017 RESULTS ALSO INCLUDED A BENEFIT OF $918 MILLION RELATED TO RE-MEASUREMENT OF NET DEFERRED TAX LIABILITIES​
* ‍EXPECTS TOTAL CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR 2018 OF APPROXIMATELY $1.5 BILLION​
* ‍TURNAROUND EXPENDITURES FOR FULL YEAR 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO BE $575 MILLION​
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $10.80 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
